subject: p16662264
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. The ET tube tip was 27 cm above the carina. The NG tube tip is in the stomach. Heart size and mediastinum are stable and there is substantial interval improvement in widespread parenchymal opacities, although they are still significantly involving the entire lungs.
